_header: Almighty God in trinity / In whom onely is persons three
Note: For four lines of the Speculum occurring separately see 5783.
Bibliographic Ghosts: Oxford, Bodleian Library Rawlinson C.884 (SC 12718): see Oxford, Bodleian Library Rawlinson C.316 (SC 12172); London, British Library Harley 5977: see 3581.
_description: William of Nassyngton, Speculum Vitae — in couplets
